title: How to Delete Zip Files on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open the File Explorer in a new window.
steps.content: Open the File Explorer in a new window. You can search File Explorer, or find it on your Start menu. You can also just open any folder on your computer to open a new File Explorer window.

steps.title: Locate the Zip file you want to delete.
steps.content: Locate the Zip file you want to delete. Browse your folders in File Explorer, or use the Search Quick access field on the top-right corner, and find the Zip file you want to delete.

steps.title: Click your Zip file in File Explorer.
steps.content: Click your Zip file in File Explorer. This will select and highlight the Zip file.

steps.title: Press ⇧ Shift+Delete on your keyboard.
steps.content: Press ⇧ Shift + Delete on your keyboard. This keyboard combination will permanently delete the selected Zip file without moving it to your trash folder or Recycle Bin. You will have to confirm your action in a new pop-up window. If you just want to move the file to Recycle Bin, press Delete .

steps.title: Click Yes in the confirmation pop-up.
steps.content: Click Yes in the confirmation pop-up. This will permanently delete your Zip file, and remove it from your PC.

steps.title: Open a new Finder window.
steps.content: Open a new Finder window. Click the blue smiling face icon the far-left end of your Dock to open Finder.

steps.title: Find the Zip archive you want to delete.
steps.content: Find the Zip archive you want to delete. Browse your files, or use the Search bar on the top-right corner of the Finder window, and open the folder that contains the Zip file you want to delete.

steps.title: Right-click on the Zip file you want to delete.
steps.content: Right-click on the Zip file you want to delete. This will open your right-click options on a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Select Move to Trash on the right-click menu.
steps.content: Select Move to Trash on the right-click menu. This will move the selected Zip file to your computer's Trash bin.

steps.title: Open your Trash folder.
steps.content: Open your Trash folder. Click the trash bin icon on the far-right end of your Dock to open Trash in a new window.

steps.title: Right-click your Zip file in Trash.
steps.content: Right-click your Zip file in Trash. This will open your right-click menu.

steps.title: Select Delete Immediately on the right-click menu.
steps.content: Select Delete Immediately on the right-click menu. This will permanently delete the selected Zip file, and remove it from your Mac. Alternatively, you can select Empty Trash on the right-click menu here to delete everything in your Trash.
